sentence: Former football great Herschel Walker skipped the first major Republican U.S. Senate debate, but his absence at the event in Gainesville on Saturday helped shape the back-and-forth among the five candidates who showed up.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Herschel Walkers no-show looms large over Senate GOP debate

sentence: Running for the U.S. Senate in Georgia, Herschel Walker has taken a different tack, saying he doesnt want to look backward at the 2020 election.
author: DAVID KLEPPER and JEFF AMY
title: GOP works to get out the vote after calling elections rigged
